events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle last night, requesting to file a new claim for the damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords such as 'vehicle' and 'collision' found in the initial report.
An agent experienced in handling auto accident claims has been assigned to manage and follow up on the case details.
The claim has been formally acknowledged by the insurance company, confirming receipt and initiation of processing.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to support the claim.
The customer provided all requested documentation including detailed photos, official police report, and quotes from repair shops.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has begun, including review of evidence and interviews where necessary.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident was caused by another driver; liability and claim validity have been established.
A settlement offer has been prepared and proposed to the customer based on repair costs and policy terms.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriter, confirming the agreed settlement terms and coverage.
The payment for the approved claim amount was issued and sent to the customer's designated bank account.
The claim process has been completed successfully, and the case has been formally closed in the system.
